subject: cancel order SSN5498

conversations.body_text: Hi Castillo, Samuel,    We apologize, but your order has already been shipped and we are unable to cancel it for you.  https://www.fedex.com/fedextrack/?trknbr=887529121177&trkqual=12029~887529121177~FDEG
